title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $60,000 but Analysts Warn of More Selling Ahead
shortdescription: Bitcoin recovered from its previous low on Friday, narrowly escaping a drop below the critical $60,000 level, but some market analysts predicted further selling ahead.
description: Bitcoin slips 50% from peak, briefly flirts with $60,000 as bear market deepens — analysts warn institutional outflows could drive further losses.
author: Emma Chen

title: White House Hosts Key Meeting to Resolve Crypto Market Legislation Stalemate
shortdescription: Banking and crypto leaders meet at White House to resolve stablecoin rewards dispute in the Clarity Act.
description: The White House is bringing together banking and crypto leaders to resolve issues over stablecoin rewards in the Clarity Act. This could shape the future of digital asset regulations in the U.S.
author: Emma Chen

title: Solana Breaks All-Time High at $264 – Overtakes BNB as Third Largest Cryptocurrency
shortdescription: SOL surges 800% in 2024 as meme coins, DeFi, and institutional adoption drive network activity to record levels.
description: Solana hits new ATH at $264 with 800% yearly gain — meme coins and DeFi push network to 5,000 TPS sustained.
author: Emma Chen

title: MicroStrategy Acquires Another 15,000 Bitcoin – Now Holds Over 439,000 BTC Worth $43 Billion
shortdescription: Saylor's company becomes largest corporate Bitcoin holder as MSTR stock outperforms BTC itself in 2024.
description: MicroStrategy adds 15,000 BTC bringing total to 439,000 ($43B) — MSTR stock up 400% as Bitcoin treasury strategy succeeds.
author: Emma Chen

title: Ripple vs SEC Case Officially Dismissed – XRP Surges 40% Overnight
shortdescription: After 4 years, judge rules XRP not a security in landmark victory.
description: SEC drops appeal after devastating court loss – XRP relisted on major U.S. exchanges within hours.
author: Emma Chen

title: Coinbase Launches Decentralized Exchange on Base – Competes Directly with Uniswap
shortdescription: Largest U.S. exchange enters DEX market with zero-fee trading and institutional-grade liquidity.
description: Coinbase DEX launches with $5B TVL — integrates with 100M+ user base and bridges CeFi and DeFi.
author: Emma Chen

title: Trump Announces U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve – BTC Hits $108,000
shortdescription: President-elect confirms government will hold Bitcoin as national reserve asset – biggest crypto policy win ever.
description: In first post-election speech, Donald Trump declares the United States will begin accumulating Bitcoin as a strategic reserve, similar to oil. Treasury to purchase 1 million BTC over 5 years.
author: Emma Chen

title: Circle Files for $50 Billion IPO – USDC Becomes First Public Stablecoin Giant
shortdescription: USDC issuer goes public at highest crypto valuation since Coinbase – Tether market share plummets.
description: Circle's S-1 reveals $1.1B annual revenue, 85% institutional volume, and plans to dominate regulated stablecoin market after going public in 2025.
author: Emma Chen
